when you unpack the "Battlefield 1942.rar", will apear 2 folders(CD1 and CD2). Into these folders, the ISO is splited in many files(.00,.01,.02... Ignore it), just find the "*.rar" and unpack normally.
Emulate with Daemon Tools or Alchool 120% and follow the screen instructions.
Inside the Crack folder, is the crack(Dé”r!) and the Serial ( 5000-0000000-0000000-1318 ).
Enjoy it!
